item.title: First shot : Green Bee Eater
item.description:
A brief about green bee eater.

The green bee-eater have cravings to eat bees. It can even digest 200-220 bees a day â€“ a good reason to be hated by bee-keepers uhm.

Wasps, dragonflies and butterflies are occasionally on the menu. Another fun fact is, it eats insects which are poisonous in nature.

It used to hit its pecker on wood or some surface, it is her natural way to remove that poison from the pray, interesting han :)
